sources.title: Merrily Yours
sources.description: Title: Merrily Yours Summary: Sonny falls for the pretty new girl next door and decides to take her to a party. First, however, he has to get his sister Mary Lou to go to sleep, which is proving to be a harder task than he anticipated. Directed by: Charles Lamont Actors: Shirley Temple, Frank Coghlan Jr., Mary Blackford Production Company: Educational Films Corporation of America Release Date: 6 October 1933 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Sonny falls for the pretty new girl next door and decides to take her to a party. First, however, he has to get his sister Mary Lou to go to sleep, which is proving to be a harder task than he anticipated.

metadata.Plot: Sonny falls for the pretty new girl next door and decides to take her to a party. First, however, he has to get his sister Mary Lou to go to sleep, which is proving to be a harder task than he anticipated.
